title: Julius Caesar
brief_description: Film adaptation of Shakespeare’s “Julius Caesar” stars Charlton Heston in the role of Mark Antony and Harold Tasker as Julius Caesar. Cast includes Grosvenor Glenn, Robert Holt, Mary Sefton Darr. Video also contains a collector’s bonus in the form of a 10 minute minidoco on the making of “The Ten Commandments” presented by Cecil B. De Mille.
